00034         queue_size = pq_get_size(state->pq);
00035         if (queue_size <= 1)
00036                 return;
00037 
00038         delta_t = tw_now(lp) - state->last_event;
00039

00042         if (delta_t < EPSILON) // already done an seir check at this time.

00053                 a = (epi_agent *) pq_next( pq, i);
00054                 //printf("\ta: %d, stage: %d\n ", a->id, a->stage);
00055                 if (a->stage == EPI_SUSCEPTIBLE)
00056                 {
00057                         for (j = 0; j < queue_size; j++)
00058                         {
00059                                 if ( j == i ) continue;
00060                                 ai = (epi_agent *) pq_next(pq, j);

00062                                 //printf("a: %d, ai: %d, ln_multiplier: %f\n", a->id, ai->id, s->ln_multiplier);
00063                                 if (abs(s->ln_multiplier) > EPSILON)
00064                                 {
00065                                         // tw_geometric draws from uniform until the draw is greater than P.
00066                                         // tw_geometric then returns the number of draws.
00067                                         // For large P (which is 1.0 - multiplier) this could be very large.
00068                                         // Also note that tw_geometric always returns an integer of 1 or
00069                                         // greater.
00070                                         draw = tw_rand_unif(lp->id);
00071 
00072                                         draw = log(draw);
00073                                         draw /= g_epi_stages[a->stage].ln_multiplier;

00079                                         //      a->id, a->stage, ai->id, ai->stage, draw);
